# Finance Team Pull Request

## Description
Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue or requirement.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Configuration change
- [ ] Documentation update

## Financial Impact
- [ ] This change affects financial calculations
- [ ] This change affects reporting
- [ ] This change affects compliance requirements
- [ ] No financial impact

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests have been added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests have been added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing has been completed
- [ ] Test data has been validated for accuracy

## Compliance & Security
- [ ] Changes comply with financial regulations (SOX, GAAP, etc.)
- [ ] Sensitive financial data is properly secured
- [ ] Audit trail is maintained
- [ ] Changes have been reviewed for PCI compliance (if applicable)

## Documentation
- [ ] Code comments have been added/updated
- [ ] Financial process documentation has been updated
- [ ] User-facing documentation has been updated
- [ ] API documentation has been updated (if applicable)

## Stakeholder Review
- [ ] Finance team lead has reviewed
- [ ] Accounting team has been notified (if applicable)
- [ ] Auditors have been informed (if applicable)

## Additional Notes
Add any additional context, screenshots, or information that reviewers should know.
